subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Murray used a barrage of baseline forehands to keep the match close, but he struggled through pain as Djokovic took command and advanced to his eighth straight semifinal in Flushing Meadows.
snippet: Murray used a barrage of baseline forehands to keep the match close, but he struggled through pain as Djokovic took command and advanced to his eighth straight semifinal in Flushing Meadows.
